document_data.name: Hylgaun
document_data.mainbody: '''Hylgaun''' was a forester active near the [[Thunder Peaks]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1356}}, Hylgaun shared with [[Raunel]] that he had seen [[Shandril Shessair]] along the road. This was shared the next evening with [[Lendys]], who in turn reported within a day to the [[High Imperceptor of Bane]].
